summary: This is an email correspondence between an Assistant United States Attorney and an FBI agent regarding the preparation and service of a subpoena to UBS Bank USA for financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell. It references a previous subpoena to UBS Financial Services and provides contact information for the forensic accountant and special agent handling the matter.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: The subpoena is being prepared to obtain her financial records from UBS Bank USA, specifically mentioning credit card products.

persons.name: Mark Lubin
persons.context: He is listed as the contact person for any questions regarding the subpoena to UBS Bank USA for Ghislaine Maxwell's records.

connections.description: Mark Lubin, as a forensic accountant, is involved in the financial investigation targeting Ghislaine Maxwell, as evidenced by the subpoena for her bank records.

events.title: Subpoena Issued to UBS Bank USA for Maxwell
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney requests the preparation of a subpoena to UBS Bank USA for financial records related to Ghislaine Maxwell, specifically noting credit card products.

locations: Southern District of New York, 1 St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
Federal Bureau of Investigation, 26 Federal Plaza, New York, NY 10278
New York Field Office, 26 Federal Plaza, NYC, NY 10278
keyFacts: A subpoena was issued to UBS Bank USA on September 25, 2019, for financial records pertaining to Ghislaine Maxwell.
The subpoena specifically sought records for products like credit cards, which were held by UBS Bank USA, not UBS Financial Services (which had received a previous subpoena).
Forensic Accountant Mark Lubin and a Special Agent were the designated contacts for the subpoena, indicating an active financial investigation into Maxwell.
